overview: Steve Fletcher is a Managing Director with GCA Savvian focused on digital media and software. Steve has 18 years of investment banking experience, as well as 3 years at Deloitte & Touche as a CPA. Steve was at Goldman Sachs for nine years, where he held a number of leadership roles including head of IT Services Banking, head of Systems and Storage Banking, and head of the Private Placement Group. Steve received a BA in Economics from UCLA and an MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.
